metadata.name: Heaven's Call [Solar Update](RGON)
metadata.description:
[img] https://i.ibb.co/4gfB4Ycy/heaven-call.png [/img] [url=https://repentogon.com/index.html][b]THIS MOD REQUIRES [img]https://i.ibb.co/zTdqYPTz/repentogon.png[/img] TO FUNCTION[/b][/url] [url=https://twitter.com/HeavensCallMOD] [img] https://i.ibb.co/d09RHHWH/twitter.png [/img] Follow Heaven's Call on Twitter [/url] [url=https://github.com/Ultrinik/HeavensCallPublic/releases/latest] [img] https://i.ibb.co/677dKRwp/github.png [/img] Mirror download for manual installation [/url] [url=https://ultrinik.itch.io/heavens-call-suika] [img] https://i.ibb.co/5WtkKpR7/itchio.png [/img] Play Heaven's Call Suika [/url]
[img] https://i.ibb.co/TMqXjnJ9/bosses-tittle.png [/img] [b] 13 new boss battles [/b] await your challenge! [list] [*] [b]1 FINAL BOSS![/b] [*] 10 Challenge Bosses! [*] 2 Special Bosses! [/list] [img] https://i.ibb.co/bgm8T5Xw/rooms-tittle.png [/img] [b] 2 new rooms [/b] are ready to be explored! [list] [*] [b]Astral Challenge[/b]: Battle a planet for treasures! [*] [b]Lunar Pact[/b]: Break your hearts for high quality items! [/list] [img] https://i.ibb.co/LzpPv7vG/items-tittle.png [/img] [b] 23 new items + 16 new trinkets [/b] await to be collected! [list] [*] 10 Passives [*] 6 Actives [*] 7 Familiars [*] 16 Trinkets [/list] [img] https://i.ibb.co/k6chzHDP/challenges-tittle.png [/img] [b] 3 new challenges [/b] are ready to be beaten! [list] [*] [b] Tower of Babel [/b]: [b]Boss Rush[/b] & [b]Arena[/b] challenge [*] [b] True Solar System [/b]: [b]BALLS![/b] [*] [b] Escape the Everchanger [/b]: [b]Horror[/b] escape room challenge [/list] [img] https://i.ibb.co/bR13N31J/others-tittle.png [/img] [b] More stuff [/b] which I won't dedicate a section to!
[h1] Mods with special interactions [/h1] [list] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1978904635] [b]MiniMAPI[/b] [/url]: Highly recommended [b]but not required[/b], without it mini-map icons won't show properly [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2635267643] [b]Enhanced Boss Bars[/b] [/url]: Bosses have custom icons and health bars [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=836319872] [b]External Item Descriptions[/b] [/url]: Descriptions for most stuff in the mod [*] [i]Small[/i] interactions with the following mods: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2851063440]Fiend Folio[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2880387531]Revelations[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2993558907]The Future[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2974704582]Fall From Grace[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2818356312]Tainted Treasure[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2722017893]Andromeda[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3010945909]Rune Rooms[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3416946312]Exodus[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2530772508]Alt Horsemen[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3297246061]Boss Butch![/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3343815332]Last Judgement[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3420129062]Dark Vaults[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3012430463]Epiphany[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2500963144]Eternal Edition[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3169946719]Time Machine[/url] [/list]
[h1] Credits [/h1] [list] [*] [url=https://twitter.com/UltrinikXD]Ultrinik[/url]: Main developer [*] [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOkq76alQLrfSFkQVLPlgeA] Nihil[/url]: Music [*] [url=https://twitter.com/JunkyX1122] Junky[/url]: Help with artworks [*] Kharjaro: Help with sound effects [*] [url=https://twitter.com/Aladar_C137]Aladar[/url], Churupinha, mycenaut, Harvester, Mattee, Grommy, IzzyIsakoi_: Help with sprites [*] Jerb: Help with shaders [/list] And every mod developer from which I used code <3 [i]If you collaborated with HC development and your name is not here, tell me![/i]
[h1][b] If you are going to report a bug or post a suggestion, please do so in the appropriate discussion. [/b][/h1]
